dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Google Form:  copyright DMCA Complaint of alleged copyright infringement

1. Complainant's Information
Name: 
Company name: GRUPO PLANETA
Full legal name of the copyright holder: EDITORIAL PLANETA, SAU
Country of residence: ES

2. Your copyrighted work
Location of copyrighted work (where your authorized work is located): 

 
http://www.planetadelibros.com/la-quimica-secreta-de-los-encuentros-libro-67407.html
http://www.planetadelibros.com/las-guerreras-maxwell-desde-donde-se-domine-la-llanura-libro-67912.html 

Description of the copyrighted work:

According to the protocol of the DMCA  
(Digital Millennium Copyright Act):

1. We have noted that the  website owned, is offering free downloads of  
various works belonging to Grupo Planeta, and in particular titles of our  
authors Marc Levy and Megan Maxwell, works of Grupo Planeta.

Please note that Grupo Planeta is the exclusive holder, through different  
legal entities of the Group members, the rights of numerous works that free  
download is available on its website and in particular, the work cited  
therefore copying, reproduction, plagiarism, distribution and / or publicly  
performed without our consent not only contravenes the provisions of the  
Copyright Spanish Laws.

Please, find attached the legal information:

http://www.planetadelibros.com/la-quimica-secreta-de-los-encuentros-libro-67407.html
http://www.planetadelibros.com/las-guerreras-maxwell-desde-donde-se-domine-la-llanura-libro-67912.html

2. Please, find attached the clear samples collected from the following URL:

http://antiguatele.blogspot.com.es/2012/11/descargar-la-quimica-secreta-de-los.html
http://antiguatele.blogspot.com.es/2012/11/descargar-desde-donde-se-domine-la.html

3. Editorial Planeta, S.A.U. Spanish Company, domiciliated 08034 Barcelona  
(Spain), Avenida Diagonal 662-664, Tel: (+34) 934928164  , Fax: (+34)  
934928560, email: acalvog@planeta.es.

4. We have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials  
described above and included in the service are not authorized by the  
copyright owner, its agent, or the protection of the law.

5. We swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the  
notification is accurate and that we own the copyright and are therefore  
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is  
allegedly infringed.

For all the foregoing, I hereby require you to immediately withdraw from  
its website all the works being owned by companies belonging to Grupo  
Planeta, and specifically cited the work as indicated in previous lines,  
leaving distributing them for free.

Sincerely,

Grupo Planeta
Asesoría Jurídica
Avda. Diagonal 662-664, Planta 8ª
08034 Barcelona
Tel.: (+34) 93 492 81 64
Fax: (+34) 93 492 85 60 

3. Allegedly Infringing Material:
URL of the allegedly infringing material in our search results:

  (1.)  
http://antiguatele.blogspot.com.es/2012/11/descargar-la-quimica-secreta-de-los.html
(2.)  
http://antiguatele.blogspot.com.es/2012/11/descargar-desde-donde-se-domine-la.html


Sworn Statements
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. [checked]

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. [checked]

Signed on this date of: 


Signature
[Private]
